segments.text: Peter ? This is Steven from China . I've got the document you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Send it to me by FedEx tomorrow morning . Or better , call Federal Express for a pick-up . That way I'll get it even earlier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about that . I'll reimburse you as soon as I receive the package .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll try . But I'm not sure Federal Express picks up mail in this city . If that's the case , I'll send the package through Chinese express mail service .
segments.speaker: S1
